content:
Data Description and Preparation:


Data Description:

The dataset consists of raw audio recordings of conversations between two individuals. This is the link of the Audio data https://drive.google.com/file/d/1bM3BUsBO0mxItJkiCPn04vGDW-dGhL1-/view?usp=drive_link


Data Preparation:

  • Gather raw audio files of conversations between two individuals.
  • Optionally compress audio files within a 25 MB limit if required by the OpenAI Whisper-Large model.
  • Utilize OpenAI Whisper to transcribe the audio files into textual format.
  • Apply GPT-4O for speaker diarization, identifying and segmenting speakers within the transcribed text.
name: Data Description and Preparation
